title: Simplify Development Task interface
description: As a developer, I want to remove Branch link, PR created text, and Rebase link from Development Task so that the interface is clean and focused.
iWant: to remove Branch link, PR created text, and Rebase link from Development Task
soThat: the interface is clean and focused
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development text is hidden
Rebase link is removed from the interface
